job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: Stilt YC W16 is building a bank focused on 45 million immigrants in the US Immigrants are traditionally shut out of the financial system because they lack a financial identity We are building technology to democratize access to financial servicesltbrgtltbrgtImproving access to financial services for everyone especially for the underserved and immigrants has never been more important They contribute 16T to the economy have built many 100B companies and generated millions of jobs Still immigrants dont get the services they deserve We are building technology to help immigrants from day 1 of their arrival Since launch we have helped hundreds of thousands of immigrants from 160 countries We are growing fast and now at an inflection point in our journey to help millions of immigrantsltbrgtltbrgtWe are based in San Francisco open to remote founded by an immigrant team with expertise in finance technology and machine learning 70 of the team is immigrants and from underrepresented backgrounds We are working hard to make financial services simple by using nontraditional data building a modern scoring and decision engine and improving operational efficiencyltbrgtltbrgtIt is a challenging and fulfilling opportunity for someone looking to make a difference in the lives of immigrants across the world As we rewrite the approach to banking we are looking for a Data Scientist who is experienced knowledgeable and believes in making this happen with usltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtResponsibilitiesltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgt ltligtContinuously explore new alternative data sources to add incremental predictiveness in the models though orthogonal signalsfeaturesltligt ltligtBuild end to end machine learning models from design learning evaluation validation ampamp monitoringltligt ltligtCreate expand explore rank ampamp maintain logs of innovative internal feature sets for credit pricing ampamp fraudltligt ltligtExpand the performance data using organic ampamp synthetic methods wherever possibleltligt ltligtDevelop automation capabilities ampamp advanced dashboards required for faster processing and monitoringltligt ltligtOwn end to end model implementation model iteration model versioning for production and sandbox environmentltligt ltligtCollaborate with the engineering and product teams to implement ship test and monitor the risk modelsltligt ltbrgtltbrgtltulgtltstronggtltugtRequirementsltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgt ltligtQuantitative Background Bachelors preferably Masters degree in Computer Science Statistics Mathematics Financial Engineering etcltligt ltligtProgramming Ability Expert knowledge of Python or R ampamp SQL Experience using cloud technologies AWS GCP and distributed datacomputing toolsltligt ltligtProficiency in writing and maintaining production level code You will ship what you writeltligt ltligtML Delivery Experience Built key ML systems from large raw data to production ampamp scaled monitored ampamp improved it over 13 years Right candidate with more experience 36 years can also be considered for senior positionltligt ltligtStatistical Mindset Understanding of the right tools for a given data analysis Focussed on model selection interpretability biases explainability ampamp monitoringltligt ltligtData Friendly Revel in data cleaning feature engineering ampamp data generationltligt ltligtClear Communicator Able to collaborate across functions and explain difficult concepts in written visual ampamp verballtligt ltligtSelf Organized Belief in data ampamp code reviewversioning reproducible work with clearconcise documentationltligt ltligtSelf Starter Willing to quickly learn new things test ampamp share with the teamltligt ltbrgtltbrgtltulgtltugtltstronggtBenefitsltbrgtltstronggtltugtltulgt ltligtThe opportunity to collaborate with a team of creative fun and driven colleagues on products that have an immediate and significant impact on peoples livesltligt ltligtCompetitive Compensationltligt ltligtComprehensive medical dental and vision coverageltligt ltligt401kltligtltulgt
